I have a new article published in the *International Journal of Sustainable Transportation* that looks at what motivates bike share users to substitute for other modes of transport. You can find the article [here](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/15568318.2022.2113577?scroll=top&needAccess=true).
